Today in County Clare, surf is on with 4 ft @ 8s WNW at spots like Lahinch Beach and Lahinch Left, though expect fresh 15 mph NW winds creating some chop. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 3 ft @ 8s WNW and light 5 mph S winds, making for clean, fun waves at places like Cregg Beach and Doughmore. By the day after, swell increases to 6 ft @ 9s W with moderate 12 mph WNW winds, offering solid options at Crab Island and Lahinch Beach. Best: tomorrow.
